sentence.Network_en: The earthquake may trigger landslides or similar local surficial movements.

sentence.Network_en: In many porphyry copper deposits, additional enrichment of the metal has been caused by surficial weathering.

sentence.Network_en: Fatigue test is done on medium carbon steel specimens with small surficial pre - cracks and single - edge pre - cracks.
